remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通过 DialogProc 函数和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 进行编程的详细信息，请参阅 [Mmc 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the DialogProc function and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
